description: Ensures explicit ".js" extensions in ESM imports
rationale: Transforms relative imports (./x -> ./x.js, ../x -> ../x.js). Skips require() statements and protected paths. Idempotent and safe textual transformations only.

description: Dependencies patch/minor upgrade with OSV security integration
rationale: Uses pnpm outdated --json to find upgrades. Uses OSV scanner for security recommendations (best-effort). Suggests only patch/minor upgrades (respects ^ and ~). Dry-run by default.
Currently implemented via pnpm --filter golden-repo exec eslint . --fix. Targets unused-imports/no-unused-imports and unused-imports/no-unused-vars rules.
